description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国工人和政治人物，全国劳动模范，曾任第四届全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: A Chinese worker and politician, National Model Worker, who served as a Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 4th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国授予劳动者的最高荣誉称号。
description.en: The highest honorary title for laborers in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、理论家、军事家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会代表

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会代表
en: Deputy to the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的组成人员。
description.en: A member of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会
en: 9th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十届中央委员会
en: 10th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党辽宁省委员会
en: Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团辽宁省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团辽宁省委员会
en: Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

nodes.id: 第四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
第四届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 4th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: One of the former major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国文化大革命后期形成的一个政治集团。
description.en: A political faction that emerged during the later stages of the Chinese Cultural Revolution.

en: Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军第二代核心领导人。
description.en: The second-generation core leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 因工作出色被推选为全国劳动模范。
description.en: Selected as a National Model Worker for her outstanding work.

description.zh-cn: 作为全国劳动模范，李素文受到了毛泽东的亲自接见。
description.en: As a National Model Worker, Li Suwen was personally received by Mao Zedong.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会代表

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命中，因为劳动模范的出身，李素文被推上了政治舞台。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Li Suwen was pushed onto the political stage due to her background as a model worker.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第九届中央委员会
中国共产党第十届中央委员会
中国共产党辽宁省委员会
中国共产主义青年团辽宁省委员会
第四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 李素文当选第四届全国人大常委会副委员长后，协助李先念管理财贸工作。
description.en: After being elected Vice Chairperson of the Standing Committee of the 4th National People's Congress, Li Suwen assisted Li Xiannian in managing financial and trade work.

description.zh-cn: 在文革后期，李素文受“四人帮”的利用。
description.en: In the later stages of the Cultural Revolution, Li Suwen was used by the 'Gang of Four'.

description.zh-cn: 李素文成为“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动的先锋。
description.en: Li Suwen became a vanguard of the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement.

description.zh-cn: “批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动旨在批判邓小平。
description.en: The 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement aimed to criticize Deng Xiaoping.

description.zh-cn: 因在“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动中扮演先锋角色，李素文于1978年被审查，政治生涯终结。
description.en: Due to her role as a vanguard in the 'Criticize Deng, Counterattack the Right-Deviationist Reversal-of-Verdicts Trend' movement, Li Suwen was investigated in 1978, ending her political career.
